admiral-screed-commander-errata.author: Fantasy Flight Games
admiral-screed-commander-errata.name: Admiral Screed
admiral-screed-commander-errata.ability: Once per activation, when a friendly ship is attacking, it may spend 1 die to change a die to a face with a :critical: icon.

admiral-trench-commander-errata.author: Fantasy Flight Games
admiral-trench-commander-errata.name: Admiral Trench
admiral-trench-commander-errata.ability: At the start of each Ship Phase, you may reveal and discard 1 command dial from this card. If you do, until the end of the round, when a friendly ship spends only a matching command token to resolve a command, that ship resolves that command as if it had spent a dial and token of the same type instead.

anakin-skywalker-commander-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
anakin-skywalker-commander-errata.name: Anakin Skywalker
anakin-skywalker-commander-errata.ability: While a friendly ship is attacking a ship, if the defender is at distance 1-5 of at least 2 other friendly ships, 1 other friendly ship at distance 1-5 of the defender may spend 1 defense token. If it does, the attacker may reroll up to 3 dice.

count-dooku-commander-errata.author: Fantasy Flight Games
count-dooku-commander-errata.name: Count Dooku
count-dooku-commander-errata.ability: You must choose at least 2 types of command tokens for this card. At the start of each Ship Phase, you may discard 1 command token from this card. If you do, each enemy ship gains a raid token matching that command token.

darth-vader-commander-errata.author: Fantasy Flight Games
darth-vader-commander-errata.name: Darth Vader
darth-vader-commander-errata.ability: While a friendly ship is attacking a ship, it may spend 1 defense token to reroll any number of dice in its attack pool.

general-draven-commander-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
general-draven-commander-errata.name: General Draven
general-draven-commander-errata.ability:
Choose command dials for this card after deploying fleets.
At the start of each Ship Phase, you may reveal and discard 1 command dial from this card. If you do, until the end of the round, when an enemy ship spends a matching command dial, it resolves that dial as though it spent a token of the same type instead. .

general-madine-commander-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
general-madine-commander-errata.name: General Madine
general-madine-commander-errata.ability: When a friendly ship is executing its first maneuver during its activation, during the Determine Course step, it may increase 1 yaw value by 1.

obi-wan-kenobi-commander-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
obi-wan-kenobi-commander-errata.name: Obi-Wan Kenobi
obi-wan-kenobi-commander-errata.ability: While a friendly ship is defending, when it spends a readied :redirect: token, it may reduce the total damage by 1 before it suffers damage.

mercy-mission-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
mercy-mission-errata.name: Mercy Mission
mercy-mission-errata.ability: Before deploying fleets, un-equip this card and choose 1 friendly small ship that is not your flagship. Equip this card to the chosen ship (even if it does not have a :fleet command: icon in its upgrade bar). At the end of the game, if you are within the enemy deployment zone, increase your score by 40 points; if you were destroyed, increase your opponent's score by 15 points.

repair-crews-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
repair-crews-errata.name: Repair Crews
repair-crews-errata.ability: :repair:: Instead of spending engineering points, you may discard 1 damage card from 1 friendly ship at distance 1-2.

slicer-tools-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
slicer-tools-errata.name: Slicer Tools
slicer-tools-errata.ability: After you execute a maneuver, you may exhaust this card to choose an enemy ship at distance 1-3. Look at the top command dial assigned to that ship. Then you may either choose a new command on its top command dial or that ship gains 1 raid token of your choice that does not match its top command dial. If the chosen ship has no top command dial, it gains 1 raid token of your choice.

high-capacity-ion-turbines-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
high-capacity-ion-turbines-errata.name: High-Capacity Ion Turbines
high-capacity-ion-turbines-errata.ability:
Modification.
The battery armaments for your left and right hull zones are increased by 1 blue die.

leading-shots-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
leading-shots-errata.name: Leading Shots
leading-shots-errata.ability: While attacking, you may spend 1 blue die to reroll any number of dice in your attack pool.

nk-7-ion-cannons-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
nk-7-ion-cannons-errata.name: NK-7 Ion Cannons
nk-7-ion-cannons-errata.ability: Blue :critical: : Exhaust this card to force the defender to choose and discard 1 of its defense tokens.

overload-pulse-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
overload-pulse-errata.name: Overload Pulse
overload-pulse-errata.ability: BLUE :crit: : Exhaust all of the defender's defense tokens.

point-defense-ion-cannons-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
point-defense-ion-cannons-errata.name: Point Defense Ion Cannons
point-defense-ion-cannons-errata.ability: While defending at close range or distance 1, during the Spend Defense Tokens step, you may force the attacker to reroll 1 die of your choice.

rapid-launch-bays-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
rapid-launch-bays-errata.name: Rapid Launch Bays
rapid-launch-bays-errata.ability: Before deploying fleets, you may set aside a number of friendly squadrons up to your squadron value next to your ship card. When you reveal a command, you may discard this card. If you do, place each squadron set aside with this card within distance 1-2 of you. Those squadrons cannot move during your activation.

reserve-hangar-deck-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
reserve-hangar-deck-errata.name: Reserve Hangar Deck
reserve-hangar-deck-errata.ability: When a friendly non-unique squadron with swarm at distance 1-5 is destroyed, you may discard this card. If you do, you may set that squadron's hull points to "2" and place that squadron unengaged at distance 1 with its activation slider toggled to the activated side.

asajj-ventress-officer-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
asajj-ventress-officer-errata.name: Asajj Ventress
asajj-ventress-officer-errata.ability: After you perform an attack targeting a ship that has 1 or more raid tokens, if the defender suffered one or more damage, you may remove 1 raid token and 1 command token from the defender. If you do, gain a matching command token.

clone-commander-wolffe-officer-errata.author: Fantasy Flight Games
clone-commander-wolffe-officer-errata.name: Clone Commander Wolffe
clone-commander-wolffe-officer-errata.ability: :squadron: : You may exhaust this card. If you do: Each of up to 3 squadrons that you activate without adept gain assault until the end of its activation. Each squadron that you activate with the *assault* keyword can spend a die with a :hit: or :accuracy: icon to resolve the assault effect. You can spend tokens from this card to ready it.

damage-control-officer-errata.author: Fantasy Flight Games
damage-control-officer-errata.name: Damage Control Officer
damage-control-officer-errata.ability: When you resolve the :contain: defense effect, you can prevent the attacker from resolving any critical effects.

darth-vader-officer-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
darth-vader-officer-errata.name: Darth Vader
darth-vader-officer-errata.ability: While a friendly ship at distance 1-5 attacking a ship, it may discard 1 of its :commander: or :officer: cards (other than Darth Vader) to reroll any number of dice in its attack pool.

governor-pryce-officer-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
governor-pryce-officer-errata.name: Governor Pryce
governor-pryce-officer-errata.ability: Once per activation, while performing an attack against an enemy ship, you may spend 1 shield from the attacking hull zone to change 1 die face to any face without an :accuracy: icon.

san-hill-officer-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
san-hill-officer-errata.name: San Hill
san-hill-officer-errata.ability: When a friendly ship at distance 1-5 resolves a :squad: command, you may discard 1 :squad: token from this card. If you do, that friendly ship may activate 1 additional squadron during that command.

support-officer-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
support-officer-errata.name: Support Officer
support-officer-errata.ability: At the start of the Command Phase, you may discard this card to discard all of your command dials.

veteran-captain-officer-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
veteran-captain-officer-errata.name: Veteran Captain
veteran-captain-officer-errata.ability: When you reveal a command, you may discard this card to gain 1 command token of your choice.

expanded-launchers-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
expanded-launchers-errata.name: Expanded Launchers
expanded-launchers-errata.ability:
Modification
The battery armament for your front hull zone is increased by 2 black dice.

rapid-reload-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
rapid-reload-errata.name: Rapid Reload
rapid-reload-errata.ability:
_Modification_. 
The battery armaments for your left and right hull zones are increased by 1 black die.

nav-team-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
nav-team-errata.name: Nav Team
nav-team-errata.ability: :nav: If you spent a :nav: token, once during this maneuver, when you would change your speed, you may instead increase 1 yaw value by 1.

hand-of-justice-title-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
hand-of-justice-title-errata.name: Hand of Justice
hand-of-justice-title-errata.ability: Before you reveal a command, you may exhaust this card to choose another friendly ship at distance 1-5 and ready 1 of its defense tokens.

dodonnas-pride-title-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
dodonnas-pride-title-errata.name: Dodonna's Pride
dodonnas-pride-title-errata.ability: BLUE :crit: Cancel all attack dice to deal 1 faceup damage card to the defender.

jainas-light-title-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
jainas-light-title-errata.name: Jaina's Light
jainas-light-title-errata.ability:
You can ignore the effects of overlapping obstacles.
Your attacks cannot be obstructed.

admonition-title-errata.author: Fantasy Flight Games
admonition-title-errata.name: Admonition
admonition-title-errata.ability: While defending, during the Spend Defense Tokens step, you may discard a defense token to cancel 1 attack die.

foresight-title-errata.author: Fantasy Flight Games
foresight-title-errata.name: Foresight
foresight-title-errata.ability: When you resolve the :evade: defense effect, you can affect 1 additional die. When you resolve the :redirect: defense effect, you can choose 1 additional adjacent hull zone to suffer damage.

home-one-title-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
home-one-title-errata.name: Home One
home-one-title-errata.ability: While another friendly ship at distance 1-5 is attacking, it may change 1 die to a face with an :accuracy: icon.

redemption-title-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
redemption-title-errata.name: Redemption
redemption-title-errata.ability: When a friendly ship at distance 1-5 resolves a :repair: command, it gains 1 additional engineering point.

invisible-hand-title-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
invisible-hand-title-errata.name: Invisible Hand
invisible-hand-title-errata.ability: While deploying fleets, if you are in the play area, when you would deploy a squadron with SWARM, you may set that squadron aside next to your ship card instead. You may set aside up to 5 squadrons this way. :squadron: : Choose any number of squadrons set aside with this card. Then place them within distance 1-3 of you. During your activation, those squadrons cannot move, and if they have AI, may increase their AI value by 1.

lucid-voice-title-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
lucid-voice-title-errata.name: Lucid Voice
lucid-voice-title-errata.ability: Treat your rear hull zone's printed battery armament as 3 red dice. The battery armament of your left and right hull zones are each increased by 1 black die and decreased by 1 blue die.

squall-title-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
squall-title-errata.name: Squall
squall-title-errata.ability: When you activate, you may choose up to 3 unengaged, friendly squadrons at close-medium range. Those squadrons may move up to distance 2. If they do, they cannot end their movement engaged.

stronghold-title-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
stronghold-title-errata.name: Stronghold
stronghold-title-errata.ability: While a friendly squadron with Swarm at distance 1-2 is defending, the attack is treated as obstructed.

resolute-title-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
resolute-title-errata.name: Resolute
resolute-title-errata.ability: You must choose at least 2 types of command tokens for this card. After you resolve a command by spending a dial, you may discard 1 matching command token from this card to gain that token.

corrupter-title-errata.author: Fantasy Flight Games
corrupter-title-errata.name: Corrupter
corrupter-title-errata.ability: :squadron:: The speed of each squadron with BOMBER you activate is increased by 1 until the end of its activation

dominator-title-errata.author: Fantasy Flight Games
dominator-title-errata.name: Dominator
dominator-title-errata.ability: When attacking at close-medium range, you may spend up to 2 shields from any of your hull zones to add that number of blue dice to your attack pool.

dual-turbolaser-turrets-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
dual-turbolaser-turrets-errata.name: Dual Turbolaser Turrets
dual-turbolaser-turrets-errata.ability:
_Modification_. 
While attacking you may exhaust this card to add 1 red die to your attack pool. If you do, remove 1 die from the attack pool.

heavy-fire-zone-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
heavy-fire-zone-errata.name: Heavy Fire Zone
heavy-fire-zone-errata.ability: While attacking a squadron, before you gather dice, if the defender is not engaged with a friendly squadron you may replace all of the blue dice in your anti-squadron armament with red dice.

heavy-turbolaser-turrets-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
heavy-turbolaser-turrets-errata.name: Heavy Turbolaser Turrets
heavy-turbolaser-turrets-errata.ability: While attacking, the :brace: defense effect cannot reduce the damage total by more than 1 unless it is the only defense token spent by the defender during the attack.

linked-turbolaser-towers-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
linked-turbolaser-towers-errata.name: Linked Turbolaser Towers
linked-turbolaser-towers-errata.ability:
While attacking a squadron, you may reroll 1 red die in your attack pool.
While attacking a ship, if you have the bombard tag, you may reroll 1 red die in your attack pool.
During your activation, while attacking the first squadron during an attack, you may exhaust this card to add 2 dice of any color to your attack pool. If you do, you cannot declare additional squadron targets for this attack.

xx-9-turbolasers-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
xx-9-turbolasers-errata.name: XX-9 Turbolasers
xx-9-turbolasers-errata.ability: :critical:: The first 2 damage cards dealt to the defender by this attack are dealt faceup.

weapons-battery-techs-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
weapons-battery-techs-errata.name: Weapons Battery Techs
weapons-battery-techs-errata.ability: While attacking a ship, you may change 1 die face with a :accuracy: icon to a face with :crit: icon.

cham-syndulla-boarding-team-errata.author: Fantasy Flight Games
cham-syndulla-boarding-team-errata.name: Cham Syndulla
cham-syndulla-boarding-team-errata.ability: When you reveal a command, you may discard a :squadron: dial or token and this card to choose 1 enemy ship at close range. If you do you may choose a new command for each command dial assigned to that ship. Then you may choose a new command dial for each of those command dials to be set to.

shriv-suurgav-boarding-team-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
shriv-suurgav-boarding-team-errata.name: Shriv Suurgav
shriv-suurgav-boarding-team-errata.ability: When you reveal a command, you may discard a :squadron: dial or token and this card to choose 1 enemy ship at close range. Choose and discard 1 :weapons-team:, :support-team:, :offensive-retro:, :defensive-retro:, :ordnance:, :ion-cannon:, or :turbolaser: upgrade card equipped to that ship.
